name: Direct Funding Now LLC
desc: Irvine-based alternative finance marketplace connecting small businesses with funding options. Five-time Inc. 5000 honoree with $8.2M revenue. Founded in 2015 with a streamlined marketplace model for small business capital.

leaders.bg: Entrepreneur with 10+ years in alternative finance and technology; five-time Inc. 5000 List honoree; founded Direct Funding Now in 2015 to create a streamlined marketplace for small businesses.
CRO at Direct Funding Now. Based in Orange, CA. Previously VP Finance at Complete Funding Financial Services and Chief Sales Officer at US Business Funding.
Chief Operating Officer at Direct Funding Now based in Irvine, CA. Oversees daily operations and financial services delivery.

name: Duke & Co, LLC d/b/a Dynamic Capital
desc: Miami-based revenue-based financing company founded in 2013, providing small business loans, MCAs, and lines of credit from $5K to $5M. Founded by industry veterans focused on improving the lending experience with lowest available rates.

leaders.bg: Co-founded Dynamic Capital in 2016 in Miami. Provides financing to small businesses traditionally lacking credit access. Active thought leader on MCA industry via LinkedIn and launching 'The Steven Edisis Show'.

name: NATIONAL BIZ LLC d/b/a National Business Capital
desc: Long Island-based fintech marketplace founded in 2007, securing $1B+ in financing for entrepreneurs. Led by Joe Camberato with no private equity; Forbes Finance Council member. Offers SBA loans, lines of credit, equipment financing, and MCAs.

leaders.bg: Founded National Business Capital in 2007, grew it from spare bedroom to one of top workplaces on Long Island without private equity. Secured $2B+ in total funding for businesses. Named CEO in 2020. Hosts 'The Fund Tank' show.

Promoted to COO after 7+ years as VP of Financing. MIT Applied Business Analytics program. 17+ years of operational leadership in business financing. Oversees funding operations, tech infrastructure, and data intelligence.
CFO at National Business Capital. CPA, CGMA with expertise in data-driven strategies and operational excellence for privately held companies.

name: Premium Merchant Funding 18, LLC
desc: Wall Street-headquartered MCA funder and financial services company founded in 2014. Offers MCAs ($2K-$2M), business loans, SBA loans, equipment financing, and credit repair with 400+ employees nationwide.

leaders.bg: Founded Premium Merchant Funding in 2014 in NYC. Currently listed as Funder. Company provides small business loans, credit card processing, cash advances, payroll, and web services. Revenue of $58.6M in 2025.
COO at Premium Merchant Funding. Fordham University JD in Law. 14+ years of customer service experience. Works closely with CEO Sam Lallouz on company culture.

name: RIVERPOINT FINANCIAL GROUP INC. d/b/a Redwood Capital Solutions d/b/a Express Capital Group
desc: Hollywood, FL-based lending firm founded in 2012, specializing in business lines of credit, short-term funding, bridge loans, equipment financing, and factoring. Operates from offices in New York and Florida.

leaders.bg: President of Riverpoint Capital since founding. Family-run business with Sruli Anatian (CEO) and Esther Anatian (COO). Based in Hollywood, FL. Provides short-term business loans and bridge financing.

name: Shore Funding Solutions Inc.
desc: Melville, NY-based business lender providing MCAs and loans up to $5M with 90% approval rate. Named Inc. 500 #593 fastest-growing company; facilitated $1B+ in total funding with team of 80+ professionals since 2014.

leaders.bg: Co-Chief Executive Officer at Shore Funding Solutions since founding in 2014. Based in Melville, NY. Company has facilitated over $1 billion in funding. Inc. 5000 honoree 2025 (#4162).
Serves as President overseeing Shore Funding Solutions' operations and strategic direction from Melville, NY headquarters.

name: Signet Capital Group Inc.
desc: Fort Lauderdale-based business funding provider founded in 2018, offering merchant cash advances, term loans, lines of credit, and revenue-based financing with approvals from $5K to $5M.

leaders.bg: Owner and CEO of Signet Capital Group, leading the company's business funding operations across merchant cash advances, term loans, and revenue-based financing.
Director at Signet Capital Group overseeing company strategy and operations in the small business financing space.

name: SKY BRIDGE BUSINESS FUNDING, LLC
website: https://SKY BRIDGE BUSINESS FUNDING, LLC was acquired by Revenued in 2020. Its services are likely integrated into Revenued's offerings or a rebranded entity such as Horizon Business Funding.
linkedinUrl: SKY BRIDGE BUSINESS FUNDING, LLC was acquired by Revenued in 2020. Its services are likely integrated into Revenued's offerings or a rebranded entity such as Horizon Business Funding.
desc: Former MCA provider acquired by Revenued in July 2020, now operating as Horizon Business Funding. Originally specialized in merchant cash advances for small businesses with a 5-star service reputation.

leaders.bg: Sky Bridge was acquired by fintech company Revenued in July 2020 and rebranded as Horizon Business Funding.

name: Acclivity Financial
desc: Subsidiary of Citizens Bank specializing in SBA 7(a) and USDA Business & Industry government-guaranteed loans nationwide, with loan programs ranging from $350K to $10M and over 500 years of combined team experience in SBA lending.

leaders.bg: Leads Acclivity Financial as a top SBA lender in the nation, overseeing government-guaranteed lending programs through Citizens Bank.
Oversees 12 lenders with over 265 collective years of SBA experience at Acclivity Financial.
Over 40 years of commercial banking experience with 18 years specific to SBA programs.

name: Amerisource Business Capital
desc: Houston-based asset-based lender founded in 1984, providing over $8 billion in capital to 1,600+ companies through factoring, ABL, trade finance, and working capital solutions with borrowing needs up to $25 million.

leaders.bg: Founded Amerisource in 1984 with a $10,000 loan from his parents, growing it into an $8 billion+ capital provider.
Managing Partner since 1998 with over 25 years of experience in commercial finance leadership.
CEO of Amerisource Business Capital leading the firm's strategic direction in asset-based lending.

name: Bluegrass Lending Group
desc: Louisville, Kentucky-based business lender founded in 2020, offering MCA, lines of credit, term financing, SBA loans, and equipment financing. Has facilitated over $250 million in funding with 24-hour capital access.

leaders.bg: Founded Bluegrass Lending in 2020 and grew it to over $250M in funded volume with offices in Kentucky and Arizona.

name: C6 Capital, LLC
desc: New York-based investment firm founded in 2018 specializing in unsecured, non-dilutive financing for lower-middle to middle-market companies, with check sizes from $250K to $10M and over $400M funded across 200+ businesses.

leaders.bg: Financial industry veteran and renowned expert on global financial markets and supply-chain analysis who founded C6 Capital in 2018.

name: CapFront
desc: Garden City, NY-based business funding marketplace founded in 2017, offering direct lending, merchant cash advances, equipment financing, invoice factoring, lines of credit, term loans, and SBA loans.

leaders.bg: Vanderbilt University graduate in corporate finance who founded CapFront in 2017 after working in SMB lending. Accepted into Forbes Business Council.
LIU graduate with a Bachelor's in Finance and Accounting who co-founded CapFront to serve the small business funding market.

name: Creative Capital Solutions
desc: New York-based private credit advisory firm and MCA broker founded in 2019, with 75+ professionals. Has funded over $1 billion to small and mid-market businesses through working capital advances, lines of credit, and asset-based loans.

leaders.bg: Founded Creative Capital Solutions in 2019 and grew it from 5 employees to one of the top brokers in America, funding over $1 billion to SMBs.

name: Ein Cap, Inc.
desc: Brooklyn, NY-based MCA funder specializing in merchant cash advances to small businesses nationwide, funding even up to 4th position deals. Works extensively with ISO broker networks.

leaders.bg: Founded Ein Cap, Inc. to provide merchant cash advances to small businesses across America through ISO partnerships.
CEO of Ein Cap managing the company's MCA operations and ISO network relationships.

name: Envision Capital Group LLC
desc: Laguna Hills, CA-based equipment financing and leasing company founded in 2007, providing nationwide equipment loans, working capital, and vendor financing programs. Inc. 5000 company from 2013-2016.

leaders.bg: CEO of Envision Capital Group leading nationwide equipment financing operations since founding in 2007. Multiple Inc. 5000 recognitions.
Chief Operating Officer overseeing Envision's equipment leasing and vendor financing operations.

name: Financial Pacific Leasing
desc: Federal Way, WA-based equipment leasing subsidiary of Columbia Bank established in 1975, providing small-ticket commercial equipment leases ($5K-$150K application-only) and commercial financing up to $15M with 150+ employees.

leaders.bg: Named President in 2025, responsible for all aspects of credit risk management including credit policy, underwriting and scorecard management.
Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer overseeing Financial Pacific Leasing's financial operations.

name: J D Factors
desc: California-based factoring company since 1989 headquartered in Palos Verdes, specializing in non-recourse freight bill factoring for trucking and transportation, plus staffing, oilfield, telecom, and general business industries.

leaders.bg: JD Factors has been providing receivables factoring since 1989 with offices across the US and Canada, serving as a premiere transportation factor in North America.

name: LEAF Commercial Capital, Inc.
desc: Philadelphia-based M&T Bank subsidiary and one of the top 15 US equipment financiers with $1.7B+ annual originations, 358 employees, providing equipment and software financing with a highly automated origination platform.

leaders.bg: Co-founded LEAF in 2001 and served as President/COO before becoming CEO. Led LEAF to become one of the top 15 equipment financiers in the US.
Co-founded LEAF in 2001 and built it into a $1.7B+ origination platform before retiring in 2024 after serving as CEO and Chairman.

name: LendingPointâ„¢
desc: AI-driven fintech based in Kennesaw, GA (Atlanta area) facilitating consumer credit origination and loan servicing. Founded in 2016, has funded over $8 billion with personal loans up to $10K and expanding into SMB point-of-sale lending.

leaders.bg: Co-founded LendingPoint in 2016 and built it into an $8B+ funded fintech with AI-driven credit origination.
Co-founded LendingPoint and leads LP Labs, the company's technology and innovation arm.
Co-founded LendingPoint in 2014 and leads strategic direction of the company.

name: Maxim Commercial Capital, LLC
desc: Los Angeles-based private commercial lender founded in 2008, providing asset-secured financing up to $3M for small and mid-sized businesses. Specializes in loans and leases secured by trucks, trailers, heavy equipment, and real estate.

leaders.bg: Promoted to CEO in January 2024 after 12 years as EVP. Previously at J.P. Morgan Real Estate Banking underwriting $1.6B in loan commitments.
Founded Maxim Commercial Capital in 2008 and serves as Chairperson overseeing the company's strategic direction.

name: Merchant Source Inc
desc: Garden City, NY-based MCA funder since 2008, providing small business financing up to $1M based on future revenue. Specializes in merchant cash advances with flexible repayment tied to daily sales volume.

leaders.bg: President of Merchant Source Inc., leading the company's MCA operations since 2008 with over 30 years of financial industry experience.

name: Pathway Lending
desc: Nashville-based nonprofit CDFI founded in 1999, providing lending and business coaching to underserved entrepreneurs across Tennessee and Alabama. Has deployed over $1 billion in economic impact with $320M+ in assets.

leaders.bg: Led Pathway Lending since 2003, growing the balance sheet from $3M to $320M+. Presidential appointee to US Treasury CDFI Advisory Board and CFPB Consumer Advisory Board.

name: Quick Capital Funding
desc: Irvine, CA-based alternative finance marketplace founded in 2014, offering MCA, term loans, SBA loans, equipment financing, and lines of credit from $5K to $5M across 725+ industries using patented scoring technology.

leaders.bg: Founded Quick Capital Funding in 2014, building it into an A+ BBB-rated alternative finance marketplace using patented scoring technology.

name: RidgeStone Capital
desc: Irvine, CA-based business lender incorporated in 2020, providing equipment financing, expansion capital, inventory funding, and working capital. Rated 4.8 stars with focus on transparency and speed.

leaders.bg: CEO of RidgeStone Capital since its 2020 incorporation, committed to providing transparent, fast, and dependable lending experiences.

name: Trio Capital
desc: Mount Laurel, NJ-based equipment finance and working capital partner backed by CPC Investments with a $56B equity partner. Focused on small to mid-ticket equipment financing and unsecured working capital from $10K to $250K.

leaders.bg: CEO of Trio Capital leading the company's equipment finance and working capital operations backed by CPC Investments.
President of Trio Capital overseeing day-to-day vendor-direct equipment finance lending partnerships.
Joined Trio Capital in 2023 as VP of Sales to expand equipment financing distribution.

name: ACE FUNDING
desc: Georgia-based business funding provider operating as Ace Partners, offering merchant cash advances, lines of credit, equipment financing, and invoice factoring. Approves businesses for 100-150% of gross monthly income.

leaders.bg: Ace Partners provides revenue-based funding solutions including MCA, lines of credit, and equipment financing to small businesses nationwide.

name: National Capital
desc: Business financing marketplace helping SMBs access multiple lending options through a single application with a 90% approval rate. Offers term loans, SBA loans, lines of credit, MCA, equipment financing, and invoice factoring.

leaders.bg: National Capital operates a business lending marketplace connecting SMBs to multiple lenders through a single application process.

name: Accord Business Funder
desc: Houston, TX-based MCA direct funder since 2013, specializing in B-paper funding in 1st, 2nd, and 3rd positions. ISO-driven model with funding from $5K to $150K, quick decisions in 2-3 hours, and a strong Texas focus.

leaders.bg: VP at Accord Business Funding overseeing operations for the ISO-driven MCA direct funder specializing in B-paper positions.
Two Texans with nearly 5 decades of combined commercial funding experience who founded Accord in 2013.

name: One Park
desc: Miami-based financial services company founded in 2010, connecting small businesses to over 20 lending partners including its direct funding arm McKenzie Capital. Offers MCA and revenue-based financing from $5K-$500K in 48 states.

leaders.bg: Named Most Influential CEO 2023 - Florida. Founded One Park Financial in 2010 to make business funding more accessible for SMBs.
Chief Operations Officer of One Park Financial overseeing the company's lending partner network and operations.

name: Gibraltar
desc: Northbrook, IL-based specialty finance company (subsidiary of Hercules Capital/NYSE: HTGC) providing asset-based loans to lower-middle-market companies. Founded in 1951 with working capital up to $100M through revolving lines and equipment term loans.

leaders.bg: Founded GBC in 2010 via management buyout of Gibraltar Financial Corporation (est. 1951). Grew assets under management by 300% and supported 300+ lower-middle-market clients.

name: Cap Fund
desc: Business funding provider offering merchant cash advances and working capital solutions to small businesses. Operates in the alternative lending space with a focus on fast funding and flexible terms.

leaders.bg: Cap Fund provides merchant cash advances and working capital solutions to small businesses through its alternative lending platform.

name: Green Capital
desc: New Jersey-based MCA funder providing business cash advances with daily ACH and split funding options. Compatible with multiple payment processors and offers revenue-based funding to small businesses.

leaders.bg: Green Capital provides business cash advances with flexible repayment through daily ACH and split funding, serving thousands of small business owners.

name: 24 CAPITAL
desc: Miami-based direct funder in the fintech space providing business loans, SBA loans, equipment financing, lines of credit, and revenue-based financing. Known for 24-hour funding speed and working with businesses regardless of credit history.

leaders.bg: 24 Capital is a Miami-based direct funder and industry leader in alternative business financing, serving retail, restaurant, and service businesses.

name: 360 Payments - 360 Payments Cap
desc: Campbell, CA (Silicon Valley) payment processing company founded in 2012, offering merchant services, POS solutions, and small business cash advances from $500 to $300,000 tied to credit card processing volume.

leaders.bg: Co-founded 360 Payments in 2012, building it into a Silicon Valley payment processing company with merchant cash advance capabilities.
Co-CEO of 360 Payments leading the company's growth in payment processing and business cash advances.

name: 8FIG
desc: Austin, TX-based fintech (Israeli-founded) providing AI-powered supply chain funding and management tools for e-commerce sellers. Recently acquired by Bizcap/NewCo Capital Group after delivering $500M+ in funding.

leaders.bg: Serial entrepreneur who previously co-founded Mercury Interactive (acquired by HP for $4.5B) and Check (acquired by Intuit for $360M). Co-founded 8fig in 2020.
Previously at Mercury Interactive and Capriza (raised $70M from Andreessen Horowitz). Leads 8fig's AI CFO technology.

name: ADVANCE SERVICE
desc: Business financing company operating as Advance Funds Network (AFN) since 2008, providing MCA, term loans, lines of credit, consolidation loans, and equipment financing. Over $1B funded with 525+ employees and strong ISO/partner programs.

leaders.bg: CRO of Advance Funds Network leading revenue operations for the alternative lending company that has funded over $1 billion since 2008.

name: AMERICAN SIMULUS FUNDING CORPS
desc: Danbury, CT-based MCA provider founded in 2009, purchasing future credit card sales from small businesses. Has provided $1B+ to 30,000+ businesses with 1-3 day funding across retail, restaurant, and service industries.

leaders.bg: Founded American Stimulus Funding Corp. and established it as a prominent player in MCA funding for small businesses across the US.
President and co-owner of American Stimulus Funding Corp., overseeing operations of the family-run MCA business.

name: ASCENDUS INC
desc: New York-based nonprofit CDFI and SBA-approved microlender founded in 1991. Has empowered 60,000+ small businesses across 49 states with $420M+ in loans, focusing on low-to-moderate-income entrepreneurs. Loans from $500 to $250K.

leaders.bg: Appointed CEO in 2011 after serving as CFO. Under his leadership, scaled annual lending 12x from $5M to nearly $60M. Previously in investment banking and public accounting.

name: BUSINESS BACKER
desc: Cincinnati, OH-based alternative business financing company founded in 2007, now owned by Enova International. Provided business loans, lines of credit, and MCA. Currently redirects new customers to OnDeck partner brand.

leaders.bg: Leads Enova International's small business financing division which includes The Business Backer brand.
